caption.title: Mutation PA D529N present in a virus from a fatal case increases pathogenicity in vivo.
caption.p: Mice (n = 5) were inoculated intranasally with different doses (106â€“102 pfu) of each CAL, PA mut, PB2 miut or PB2/PA mut recombinant virus or were mock-infected as control. Body weight for each group of animals was monitored daily for 14 days post-infection (dpi).
